name: Lonely Turret (Wildgamez)
description:
You are a turret being attacked by waves neverending enemies, starting with just a simple shooter, you can build up your offensive power over time with a variety of attachments you can put on the 8 slots around your turret.  Can you survive 5 levels of surviving 1600 enemies and 5 boss fights in each level?

With a total of 50 varieties of enemies and 7 different bosses, it won't be easy, but by using your turret and its 22 modular attachments, each with multiple tiers, you can do it if you try hard enough!

As you fight through the waves you will get to pick between 3 attachments to either add on or upgrade an existing attachment of the same type up to tier 5 attachments! If there's nothing you want, you can also take the time to repair your defenses! More attachments will become available throughout the course of every level, with the possibilities varying by the level. 

While you can upgrade over time, so will the enemies! Every few upgrades you get the enemies will change their patterns and send out stronger, faster, and scarier units, again varying by level. See how long your lonely turret will survive with your help, and try to get a nice high score for each level!

Controls
-A and D or left and right for rotating the turret
-W and S or up and down for zooming in and out
-1-8 for selecting a position to place attachments
